articles.author: Miles J. Herszenhorn
articles.title: Who is Putin ally Belarusian President Alexander Lukashenko? - USA TODAY
articles.description: Alexander Lukashenko, often described as Europe's last dictator, is the president of Belarus and a close ally of Russian President Vladimir Putin.
articles.content:
Belarusian President Alexander Lukashenko brokered a deal with Wagner mercenary group leader Yevgeniy Prigozhin on Saturday that ended an attempted armed rebellion against the Russian government.

articles.title: Macron calls for an international taxation deal to finance climate efforts - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The French president wants an international effort to raise money to tackle climate change.
articles.content:
PARIS French President Emmanuel Macron on Friday hinted at a fresh push to revamp the international taxation system to finance climate efforts.
